ygData.subject: Re: something i found
ygData.msgSnippet: I can say that I have travelled all the way from North Felwithe to South Qeynos without losing any items. I didn t take the scenic route, so I can t say
ygData.messageBody:
I can say that I have travelled all the way from North Felwithe to South
Qeynos without losing any items. I didn't take the scenic route, so I can't
say anything about zones not on a straight-line path between the two
destinations.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Daniel Devorkin [SMTP:devo@...]
> Sent: Friday, June 11, 1999 8:48 PM
> To: Enchanters
> Subject: [eqenchanters] something i found
>
> i was looking through some of my links on enchanter sites when i found
> this passage
>
> "In other news: Yes, the new jewelry patch is everything we could have
> asked for, BUT. I highly recommend you be careful selling and crafting
> items. Magical items crafted under the new patch WILL vanish if you enter
> certain zones. Qnos is one of these areas, I have no doubt there are
> others. Craft at your own risk, and I do advise you notify everyone you
> sell to to be careful where they go."
>
>
> this is disturbing news, and perhaps a flaw? or not true, has anyone
> experienced this problem? or know anything about it?
>
> -Aeramus 16th Enchanter on Bristlebane
